freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox side flippers make 2 worked in the round with milky yarn do not stuff round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 2sc 3sc 3sc 8 round 3 3sc 3sc 4sc 10 round 4 4sc 3sc 5sc 12 round 5-7 12sc * 3rnds 12 round 8 4sc 2dec 4sc 10 round 9 3sc 2dec 3sc 8 finish with slip_stitch cut the thread leaving a long tail for sewing flatten the flipper and sew from stitch to stitch through both layers over edge make another flipper in the same way hind flippers make 2 worked in the round with milky yarn do not stuff round 1 7sc in magic_ring 7 round 2 7inc 14 round 3-4 14sc * 2rnds 14 round 5 5sc 1dec *2 12 round 6 12sc 12 round 7 4sc 1dec *2 10 round 8 3sc 1dec *2 8 finish with slip_stitch cut the thread leaving a long tail for sewing flatten the fin and sew from stitch to stitch through both layers over edge make another fin in the same way 4 sleeping baby seal freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox assembly and design sew flippers to body sides slightly askew between rounds 17 and 18 with 12sts in round 17 and 16sts in round 18 from bottom apart sew hind flippers to body back one by one as it shown in the picture embroider sleeping eyes with black or dark brown thread with 6-7sts in round 5 apart please see scheme and step-by-step photos below lower the arc in the middle on 1row down with 2 small transverse stitches eyelashes 5 sleeping baby seal freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox embroider muzzle with grey thread at first embroider nose as inverted triangle on the round 1 with base width 3sts then barb down with 4sts apart in round 3 more
